sections.heading: Standards.Section 41-17-2 - Purchase for or Assignment to State Officers or Employees of Passenger Automobiles
sections.text:
Section 41-17-1

Repealed by Act 2013-282, §2, effective October 1, 2014.

(Acts 1969, No. 471, p. 914, §1; Acts 1975, 4th Ex. Sess., No. 92, p. 2770, §1; Acts 1976, No. 135, p. 129; Act 2000-681, p. 1385, §1.)
